title: Blocked Keyboard Problem
body:
So .. i have this problem since 8-9 months ago , but it happened like 1 time per game . 
Today , i saw this problem 7-8 times in last game , my keyboard just blocked , but not 100 % , only principal buttons , like (q,w,e,r,d,f-etc) . And remains blocked until i press ESC , when i press ESC , the game goes in window bar , after i click again on the game it works like never happened . Don't tell me i must reinstall the game cause in 8-9 months i do it +3 times .


And other problem , to don t open another thread/topic . Sometimes , not always , i have frames in game (for 2-3 sec) . My settings are on low , but this thing is about my pc , i think .. Whatever , i wish i will get a solution for the first problem . Thank you .

replies.body:
Aw it sucks when you think an issue is fixed but rears its head back in.  :(  I don't think you need to reinstall, but there are a variety of different factors that could cause this.  A solid first step would be to see if another keyboard would fix this to rule out hardware possibilities.

Try resetting your config as well, there could be corrupted settings not allowing input:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Depending on your keyboard, review any third party programs you have in the way to make sure it's not impacting your in-game inputs.  I hope that helps!
It works , but for few games .. like 3-4 games , after the problem showed again ..
